flawed_nl_solution:
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=100>>100 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 100 + 35 = <<100+35=135>>135 books
On Thursday, 15 books were borrowed 135 - 15 = 120 books

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 130, not 100. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
